page.description: Adds a local URL prefix to a file URL so that it can be referenced in the source property for an image, video, audio, or other element in an iOS PhoneGap app using the WkWebView plugin.

description.p: The file URL to add a custom scheme.

Returns a local URL prefixed with "alpha-local://extension?url=" where "extension" is the file extension. For example, if *[js:fileURL]* is a .jpg file, the prefix will be *[js:alpha-local://jpg?url=]*

discussion.p: When using the Alpha WkWebView plugin, you cannot set the *[js:src]* property of an image, audio, video, etc, element directly. You must add the appropriate scheme to the file URL using this method.

*[js:{dialog.object}.addCustomSchemeForAlphaWkWebView()]* wraps the file URL in the required scheme and returns a URL that can be used with image, audio, video, and other elements in the UX component.
If used in a PhoneGap application using the UIWebView plugin, or if the application is running on an Android device, the file URL is not modified.

page.limitations: PhoneGap Applications using Alpha WkWebView Only
